fixes.name: fixed netting 3 R
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR summaryTable =
    ADDCOLUMNS(
        SUMMARIZE(
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)',
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate],
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Subs],
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Counterpty],
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Cash curr],
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Maturity Date],
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[R/RR]
        ),
        "groupSum", CALCULATE(
            SUM('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Ut. US MM]),
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Is Forward Start ?] = 0,
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Is Approved for Netting] = "1",
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Bucket] <> "open",
            'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[R/RR] = "R"
        )
    )
RETURN
    SUMX(summaryTable, ABS([groupSum]))
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced the FIXED LOD by grouping the table at the FIXED keys using SUMMARIZE and computing the per-group sum with CALCULATE (applying the same boolean filters). Then summarized across groups with SUMX( ..., ABS(groupSum)). This preserves the semantics of the Tableau {FIXED ... : SUM(...)} wrapped by ABS and an outer SUM.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The Tableau expression uses a FIXED LOD and aggregation (Sum), which requires an aggregate/context-aware calculation in Power BI, so it must be implemented as a measure.
